info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ellwood City, or near New Castle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellwood City, New Beaver, Wampum, and Rose Point Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
